web_snippets: John Newman is president and chief executive officer of Progress Rail, a Caterpillar company, and a senior vice president of Caterpillar Inc.
John Newman is a senior vice president of Caterpillar Inc. and president and chief executive officer of Progress Rail, a Caterpillar company.
